author: legofan3810
title: BAD
review:
No, it's not bad, it's just a pun.

Bad is a good racers set that, unfortunately, really only goes well with the other racecars of its type. 

Building Experience 4/5: A fast, quick build that was a bit too easy.

Parts 3/5: Very bare bones here as there are a few gaps throughout the set.  There are some nice slopes and the launcher is cool, though.

Playability 5/5: Even with its flaws it is an undoubtedly fun set to race.  You will not resist the urge to stomp on the launcher every now and then.

Value for money 5/5: A unique car with a special add-on, and a modest amount of pieces makes it well worth 12 U.S. dollars.

Overall 4/5: While it shows exceptional scores throughout the board, you will have to spring a couple of bucks to complete the collection of 4 of these racers to truly enjoy its quality.  A great set for any LEGO fan.
